subject: College Athletics
Baseball
NCAA Baseball Championships
Colleges and Universities
lead_paragraph: Bayler Teal, a boy suffering from terminal cancer, was adopted by the South Carolina baseball team, which won the N.C.A.A. Division I title.
snippet: Bayler Teal, a boy suffering from terminal cancer, was adopted by the South Carolina baseball team, which won the N.C.A.A. Division I title.
